task.title: Dishes
task.shortdesc: You can create a three-dimensionaldish. The latitude lines of a dish are always parallel with the xy plane of the current UCS; the central axis is always parallel with the z-axis. You position a dish by specifying its center point. You determine the size of a dish by specifying either its radius or its diameter.

context.p: To create a dish as a three-dimensionalsurface

step.cmd: Choose Draw > Surfaces > 3D Surfaces from the mainmenu.
On the command line, type DI (DIsh).
Specify the center andradius or diameter as described previously.
